title: Megan Barton-Hanson and Chelcee Grimes discovered they were both texting the same girl before split
text:

Love Island star Megan Barton Hanson and her ex-girlfriend Chelcee Grimes were allegedly texting the same woman before they split.

Brunette bombshell Megan, 25, has been making subtle digs about her singer and footballer former flame, 27, on social media following reports that they couldn't make time to see each other.

Recent news has speculated that a 'third' girl was involved in the duo's split after Megan and Chelcee were both caught messaging the same person.

According to The Sun , the couple were both separately speaking to events promoter Teddy Edwardes, who took to Twitter to uncover her sticky situation.

(Image: Getty Images)

Teddy recently shared with her Twitter followers: "I’ve got a girl and her girlfriend in my DM’s but neither of them know the other is doing it.

"When do I break the news or do I carry on and mind my business?"

The night club promoter - who previously dated X Factor's Lucy Spraggan - didn't name the culprits but later alluded to the drama following the headlines.

She wrote: "How have I been single 5 minutes and already become centre stage of every lesbian drama? Just let me lesbian in peace for gods sake."

(Image: Instagram)

A source told The Sun that it was Megan's other ex-girlfriend, TOWIE star Demi Sims, 23, who told Chelcee that Megan was messaging Teddy.

This comes after former stripper Megan took to social media to secretly throw shade towards Chelcee and their past relationship.

She shared a quote that said: "Reminder: Relationships are supposed to make you feel good."

(Image: Instagram)

Hours after Megan made the cryptic post, Chelcee shared a quote on her own Instagram that hinted about her side of the split.

She shared lines from a poem called Irrelevant Now by author Arch Hades, with the lyrics reading: "Instead of standing by my side You tricked me into conceding.

"Into dimming my own light, Feeling guilty got succeeding."

Yesterday, Chelcee shared yet another cryptic post hinting at her feud with Megan in the caption: "Been there, done that, (don’t have the T-shirt)."

(Image: Chelcee Grimes/Instagram)

A source recently told the Mail Online : "Megan and Chelcee were just as bad as each other. They were both sending messages to Teddy without the other one knowing."

The couple originally confirmed their romance during a day out at Manchester's Etihad Stadium. Megan also featured in Chelcee's music video for song Time To Talk, which saw them kissing and going on a date.

Megan rose to fame after finding love with Wes Nelson on the 2018 series of Love Island. Since then, the reality star enjoyed a short fling with TOWIE star Demi Sims after meeting on E4 show Celebs Go Dating .

Meanwhile, Megan, is getting over her latest split and putting all her efforts into working with High Street lingerie brand Ann Summers, while Chelcee is back focusing on her music career.
description: Their six-week long romance came to an abrupt end after they discovered they were both embroiled in a love triangle
